name: The Terrible Misadventures of The Gatcha Ghost Hunting Squad
name_original: The Terrible Misadventures of The Gatcha Ghost Hunting Squad
description:
Our first build prototype of our gatcha/horror game. Lost in the endless hotel, trapped with an enemy AI and puzzle mechanics. Will you make it out? Or break the game?

Controls: 

WASD - Move

E - Flashlight

Shift - Sprint

TURN ON SOUND :D

[PROTOTYPE V1]
